name: Annapurna Interactive Deluxe Limited Edition
storyline:
Includes: 
- Donut County 
- Gorogoa 
- Kentucky Route Zero: TV Edition 
- Outer Wilds 
- Sayonara Wild Hearts 
- Telling Lies 
- Wattam 
- What Remains of Edith Finch
summary: Since the release of What Remains of Edith Finch in 2017, Annapurna Interactive has rhythmically — game after game — nurtured visionary, creator-driven experiences like no other publisher. Each title is wholly unique, yet when viewed from the macro perspective, as a family of games, the impeccable curation and producorial pedigree of Annapurna becomes clear. Countless, coveted accolades decorate this ensemble of amazing games, and this PS4 box set celebrates the eclectic and innovative nature of each of the eight included titles, including the previously unreleased PS4 physical edition of Sam Barlow’s masterpiece, Telling Lies, and Jason Roberts’ opus, Gorogoa. This elegant, custom-designed folio package is as premium as it gets — a definitive limited edition, so don’t miss out!
